value.stringValue:
{"mentions":[],"message":"As "Cutover Appointment Confirmed" field is unchecked, the following automation has happened:
1. Cutover Appointment Date & Time has been blanked out. 
2. Status has been reverted back to "Scheduled Next Month"
3. Controlling field “Stop Appointment Confirmed Process” unticked.
4. Controlling field “Stop Cutover Reminder Email” unticked.
5. Account alert "{![Case].Account.rrpu__Alert_Message__c}" has been cleared. "}

As "Cutover Appointment Confirmed" field is unchecked, the following automation has happened: 1. Cutover Appointment Date & Time has been blanked out. 2. Status has been reverted back to "Scheduled Next Month" 3. Controlling field “Stop Appointment Confirmed Process” unticked. 4. Controlling field “Stop Cutover Reminder Email” unticked. 5. Account alert "{!myVariable_current.Account.rrpu__Alert_Message__c}" has been cleared.
{"mentions":[],"message":"\"Account alert updated to : \" & \"FortiGate rollout - Under \" & TEXT([Case].Status))"}
"Account alert updated to : " & "FortiGate rollout - Under " & TEXT([Case].Status))
{"mentions":[],"message":"A catch up survey has been sent to {![Case].Contact.FirstName} \nEmail: ({![Case].Contact.Email})\nSurvey Sent date time has been filled in."}

actionCalls.name: myRule_1_A2
actionCalls.label: Send Cutover Completed email to school

value.stringValue:
{"mentions":[],"message":"As Cutover Date (Actual) entered, the following automated actions has been completed:
1. Status updated from Change Freeze to Warranty.
2. The cutover completed email has been sent to the case contact ({![Case].Contact.Email}) and site access contact ({![Case].Primary_Site_Access_Contact__c.Email}).
3. Case "Stop Cutover Successfully Complete Email" flag has been ticked to stop this email to be sent again when there is an update on the case.
4. Updated the school account "FortiGate Rollout Completed Date"."}

As Cutover Date (Actual) entered, the following automated actions has been completed: 1. Status updated from Change Freeze to Warranty. 2. The cutover completed email has been sent to the case contact ({!myVariable_current.Contact.Email}) and site access contact ({!myVariable_current.Primary_Site_Access_Contact__r.Email}). 3. Case "Stop Cutover Successfully Complete Email" flag has been ticked to stop this email to be sent again when there is an update on the case. 4. Updated the school account "FortiGate Rollout Completed Date".

{"mentions":[],"message":"As cutover > 1 Attempt checked:
1. Status is set back to Schedule Next Month. 
2. Account alert is removed.
3. "Stop Appointment Confirmed Process" control field is reset.
4. "Cutover Appointment" (Date/Time) erased.
5. "Cutover Appointment Confirmed" unchecked."}

As cutover > 1 Attempt checked: 1. Status is set back to Schedule Next Month. 2. Account alert is removed. 3. "Stop Appointment Confirmed Process" control field is reset. 4. "Cutover Appointment" (Date/Time) erased. 5. "Cutover Appointment Confirmed" unchecked.
subflow MNU Email School Appointment Confirmation

{"mentions":[],"message":"As field "Cutover Appointment Confirmed" is ticked, the following automated actions have been completed:
1. Status is updated from Scheduled Next Month to Appointment Confirmed.
2. The appointment confirmed email has been sent to the case contact ({![Case].Contact.Email}) and site access contact ({![Case].Primary_Site_Access_Contact__r.Email}).
3. "Stop Appointment Confirmed Process " flag has been ticked to prevent this process to run again when there is an update on the case."}

As field "Cutover Appointment Confirmed" is ticked, the following automated actions have been completed: 1. Status is updated from Scheduled Next Month to Appointment Confirmed. 2. The appointment confirmed email has been sent to the case contact ({!myVariable_current.Contact.Email}) and site access contact ({!myVariable_current.Primary_Site_Access_Contact__r.Email}). 3. "Stop Appointment Confirmed Process " flag has been ticked to prevent this process to run again when there is an update on the case.

{"mentions":[],"message":"The status is auto update to \"Change Freeze\" as it's now 6 days before the confirmed cutover date {![Case].Cutover_Appointment_Date_Time_Text__c}.\n\nAccount alert of Change Freeze is also automatically set."}

The status is auto update to "Change Freeze" as it's now 6 days before the confirmed cutover date {!myVariable_current.Cutover_Appointment_Date_Time_Text__c}.
Account alert of Change Freeze is also automatically set.

{"mentions":[],"message":"As it is 2 days before the confirmed cutover date {![Case].Cutover_Appointment_Date_Time_Text__c}, the following automations have happened:
1. Register the 2 days cutover reminder email to be sent to the case contact ({![Case].Contact.Email}) and the site access contact.
2. A checklist has also been emailed to the case owner {![Case].Owner:User.FirstName}.
3. Controlling field "Stop Cutover Reminder Email" has been set to checked."}

As it is 2 days before the confirmed cutover date {!myVariable_current.Cutover_Appointment_Date_Time_Text__c}, the following automations have happened: 1. Register the 2 days cutover reminder email to be sent to the case contact ({!myVariable_current.Contact.Email}) and the site access contact. 2. A checklist has also been emailed to the case owner {!myVariable_current.Owner:User.FirstName}. 3. Controlling field "Stop Cutover Reminder Email" has been set to checked.
{"mentions":[],"message":"2 days after cutover Post Upgrade survey has been sent to {![Case].Contact.FirstName} \nEmail: ({![Case].Contact.Email})\nSurvey Sent date time has been filled in."}

{"mentions":[],"message":"2 days (skipping weekend) after cutover Post Upgrade survey has been sent to {![Case].Contact.FirstName} \nEmail: ({![Case].Contact.Email})\nSurvey Sent date time has been filled in."}

Flow.description: Added subflow to send email to Complex Rollout Sites with Aligned vs Unaligned Rollout ICT Alignment.

value.stringValue: IF(AND(TEXT([Case].Status)="Closed - Resolved",CONTAINS([Case].Account.rrpu__Alert_Message__c , "FortiGate rollout - Under") ),"","FortiGate rollout - Under " & TEXT([Case].Status))
